ndarray/tables/Table.hpp

00001 #ifndef NDARRAY_TABLES_Table_hpp_INCLUDED
00002 #define NDARRAY_TABLES_Table_hpp_INCLUDED
00003 
00004 #include "ndarray.hpp"
00005 #include "ndarray/tables/Row.hpp"
00006 #include "ndarray/tables/detail/Iterator.hpp"
00007 
00008 namespace ndarray { namespace tables {
00009 
00010 template <typename T>
00011 class Table {
00012     typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::Columns_ Columns_;
00013     typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::ColumnsPtr ColumnsPtr;
00014 public:
00015 
00016     typedef detail::Iterator<T> Iterator;
00017     typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::Row_ Record;
00018     typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::Layout_ Layout_;
00019     typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::Raw Raw;
00020 
00022     template <int N>
00023     struct At {
00024         typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::template Fields<N>::Qualified::TableValue Type;
00025     };
00026 
00028     template <int N>
00029     typename At<N>::Type operator[](Index<N> index) const {
00030         return typename At<N>::Type((*_columns)[index]);
00031     }
00032 
00033     Iterator begin() const { return Iterator(Record(0, _columns)); }
00034     Iterator end() const { return Iterator(Record(_columns->getSize(), _columns)); }
00035 
00037     Record const operator[](int n) const { return Record(n, _columns); }
00038 
00040     Table const & operator[](View< boost::fusion::vector<ndarray::detail::FullDim> > const & def) const {
00041         return *this;
00042     }
00043 
00045     Table const operator[](View< boost::fusion::vector<ndarray::detail::RangeDim> > const & def) const {
00046         return Table(_columns->index(boost::fusion::front(def._seq)));
00047     }
00048 
00050     Table const operator[](View< boost::fusion::vector<ndarray::detail::SliceDim> > const & def) const {
00051         return Table(_columns->index(boost::fusion::front(def._seq)));
00052     }
00053 
00055     Manager::Ptr getManager() const { return _columns->getManager(); }
00056 
00058     Raw * getRaw() const { return _columns->getRaw(); }
00059 
00061     int getSize() const { return _columns->getSize(); }
00062 
00064     int getStride() const { return _columns->getStride(); }
00065 
00067     Layout_ const & getLayout() const { return _columns->getLayout(); }
00068 
00070     Table(Table const & other) : _columns(other._columns) {}
00071 
00073     Table & operator=(Table const & other)  {
00074         if (&other != this) _columns = other._columns;
00075         return *this;
00076     }
00077 
00079     template <typename U>
00080     Table(Table<U> const & other, typename boost::enable_if< boost::is_same<U const,T> >::type* e = 0) :
00081         _columns(other._columns)
00082     {}
00083 
00085     template <typename U>
00086     typename boost::enable_if< boost::is_same<U const,T>, Table & >::type
00087     operator=(Table<U> const & other) {
00088         _columns = other._columns;
00089         return *this;
00090     }
00091 
00093     static Table allocate(int size, Layout_ const & layout) {
00094         Layout_ normal_layout(layout);
00095         normal_layout.normalize();
00096         int stride = normal_layout.getMinStride();
00097         std::pair<Manager::Ptr,Raw*> p = SimpleManager<Raw>::allocate(size * stride);
00098         ColumnsPtr columns = Columns_::create(size, stride, p.second, p.first, normal_layout);
00099         return Table(columns);
00100     }
00101 
00103     template <typename Owner>
00104     static Table external(Raw * raw, int size, int stride, Layout_ const & layout, Owner const & owner) {
00105         Layout_ normal_layout(layout);
00106         normal_layout.normalize();
00107         Manager::Ptr manager = ExternalManager<Owner>::make(owner);
00108         ColumnsPtr columns = Columns_::create(size, stride, raw, manager, normal_layout);
00109         return Table(columns);
00110     }
00111 
00112 private:
00113     
00114     template <typename U> friend class Table;
00115 
00116     explicit Table(ColumnsPtr const & columns) : _columns(columns) {}
00117 
00118     ColumnsPtr _columns;
00119 
00120 };
00121 
00122 }} // namespace ndarray::tables
00123
